Field.Description: Parameters marked with ○ are excluded in the NT version package.
Reserve for package output 1
Reserve for package output 2
Simple match area ID

Field.DisplayName: Multiplayer Start Limit - Event Flag ID
Field.Description: Multiplayer start limit event flag ID

Field.DisplayName: Disable Intrusion if Other Ghost In Range
Field.Description: Other distances that cannot be invaded by spirits. The intrusion position is searched for the intrusion points within the "other ghost invasion impossible distance" to the "other ghost invasion range upper limit" from the host position.

Field.DisplayName: Player Position Save Limit - Event Flag ID
Field.Description: PC position save restriction event flag ID (flag ON: PC position save valid flag OFF: PC position save invalid 0: PC position save always valid)
Areas with the same ID are treated as the same boss area.

Field.DisplayName: White Phantom Entity ID - Free Frame
Field.Description: NPC White Spirit Summon Ritual Summon The beginning of the free frame ID used as the NPC's entity ID
Whether to increase or decrease the frame of the map protection area
Is it the old man sign area of yellow robe?

Field.DisplayName: Target Flag State - Multiplayer Start Limit ID [1]
Field.Description: Flag state that limits "multiplayer start restriction event flag ID"

Field.DisplayName: Target Flag State - Invasion Start Limit ID [1]
Field.Description: Flag state that limits "intrusion restriction event flag ID1"

Field.DisplayName: Target Flag State - White Sign Start Limit ID [1]
Field.Description: Flag state that limits "white sign restriction event flag ID1"

Field.DisplayName: Target Flag State - Red Sign Start Limit ID [1]
Field.Description: Flag state that limits "red sign limit event flag ID1"

Field.DisplayName: Target Flag State - Invasion Start Limit ID [2]
Field.Description: Flag state that limits "intrusion restriction event flag ID2"

Field.DisplayName: Target Flag State - Invasion Start Limit ID [3]
Field.Description: Flag state that limits "intrusion restriction event flag ID3"

Field.DisplayName: Target Flag State - White Sign Start Limit ID [2]
Field.Description: Flag state that limits "white sign restriction event flag ID2"

Field.DisplayName: Warp Item Usage Permitted - Bonfire ID [1]
Field.Description: Bonfire entity ID1 used to determine whether to allow the use of warp items

Field.DisplayName: Warp Item Usage Permitted - Bonfire ID [2]
Field.Description: Bonfire entity ID 2 used to determine permission to use warp items

Field.DisplayName: Warp Item Usage Permitted - Bonfire ID [3]
Field.Description: Bonfire entity ID 3 used to determine permission to use warp items

Field.DisplayName: Warp Item Usage Permitted - Bonfire ID [4]
Field.Description: Bonfire entity ID 4 used to determine permission to use warp items

Field.DisplayName: Warp Item Usage Permitted - Bonfire ID [5]
Field.Description: Bonfire entity ID 5 used to determine permission to use warp items

Field.DisplayName: Warp Item Prohibition - Event Flag ID [1]
Field.Description: Event flag ID 1 to determine the prohibition of warp items. Warp item permission Higher priority than judgment by bonfire ID

Field.DisplayName: Warp Item Prohibition - Event Flag ID [2]
Field.Description: Event flag ID 2 to determine the prohibition of warp items. Warp item permission Higher priority than judgment by bonfire ID

Field.DisplayName: Warp Item Prohibition - Event Flag ID [3]
Field.Description: Event flag ID 3 to determine the prohibition of warp items. Warp item permission Higher priority than judgment by bonfire ID

Field.DisplayName: Warp Item Prohibition - Event Flag ID [4]
Field.Description: Event flag ID 4 to determine the prohibition of warp items. Warp item permission Higher priority than judgment by bonfire ID

Field.DisplayName: Warp Item Prohibition - Event Flag ID [5]
Field.Description: Event flag ID 5 to determine the prohibition of warp items. Warp item permission Higher priority than judgment by bonfire ID
Effective bloodstain / death illusion
Blood character valid
Phantom effective

Whether to display on map M01

Field.DisplayName: Target Flag State - White Sign Start Limit ID [3]
Field.Description: Flag state that limits "white sign restriction event flag ID3"

Field.DisplayName: Target Flag State - Red Sign Start Limit ID [2]
Field.Description: Flag state that limits "red sign limit event flag ID2"

Field.DisplayName: Target Flag State - Red Sign Start Limit ID [3]
Field.Description: Flag state that limits "red sign limit event flag ID3"
Is it an intrusion point automatic generation? If it is set to ○, the intrusion position is searched by the automatically generated logic for the intrusion point.

Field.DisplayName: Block Yellow Monk Multiplayer - Event Flag ID
Field.Description: Yellow Coat Host Restriction Event Flag: When this flag is turned on, multiplayer as a host of Yellow Coat is prohibited. It is assumed that the block clear flag will be inserted. 0: No limit

Field.DisplayName: Other Ghost Invasion Range - Max Limit
Field.Description: Other ghost invasion range upper limit. The intrusion position is searched for the intrusion points within the "other ghost invasion impossible distance" to the "other ghost invasion range upper limit" from the host position.

Field.DisplayName: Summoning Pool Open - Event Flag ID
Field.Description: Sign accumulation release event flag ID
Area number (mXX_00_00_00). Data for specifying the display position in the map menu
Grid X number (m00_XX_00_00). Data for specifying the display position in the map menu
Grid Z number (m00_00_XX_00). Data for specifying the display position in the map menu
X coordinates (relative coordinates from the specified map). Data for specifying the display position in the map menu
Y coordinates (relative coordinates from the specified map). Data for specifying the display position in the map menu. Not actually used, but keep XYZ aligned
Z coordinates (relative coordinates from the specified map). Data for specifying the display position in the map menu
